articles.title: Explained: Why Haiti is prone to devastating earthquakes - The Indian Express
articles.description: Haiti earthquake: The Earth's crust is made up of tectonic plates that move. And Haiti sits near the intersection of two of them - the North American plate and the Caribbean plate.
articles.content: Earthquakes have been wreaking havoc in Haiti since at least the 18th century, when the city of Port-au-Prince was destroyed twice in 19 years. The 21st century has been no less kind. Saturday’s powe… [+4568 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Biden defends US pullout from Afghanistan despite panic in Kabul - New Straits Times
articles.description: KABUL: US President Joe Biden has defended the withdrawal of American troops from Afghanistan, even in the face of the Taliban's stunning victory, which prompted panic in Kabul with thousands mobbing the airport in a desperate attempt to flee.
